title: The Only Thing I Enjoyed About Ninja Slayer Was the Art
text:
The Only Thing I Enjoyed About Ninja Slayer Was the Art 
Published By: Kotaku.com - Today 
I usually like what Studio Trigger puts out, be it the over-the-top action of Kill la Kill or the whimsical magic of Little Witch Academia ....
